name: yggdrasil-healthcare
description: Yggdrasil-Healthcare is an AI-powered healthcare management system built with the MERN stack and Python for AI modules. It serves hospitals, diagnostic labs, and clinics with features like smart patient management, EHR, diagnostics, real-time analytics, secure access, and scalable operations.

scripts.start: concurrently -n SERVER,CLIENT -c blue,green "npm run server" "npm run client"

author: Sarin Jaiswal
